extension.summary: BASSFOX based on LivetreamsPro by Shani "All rights to this author"
extension.description: [COLOR cyan][B]BassFox[/B][/COLOR] [COLOR white]- Is an Add-on [COLOR blue][B]Kodi[/B][/COLOR] with which you can enjoy free TV channels, if you are charging for this Add-on asks for money back. This Add-on has a collection of list live tv channels mostly in Spanish language, Thank you for your preference [COLOR cyan][B]BassFox[/B][/COLOR] based on LivetreamsPro by[COLOR cadetblue][B] SHANI ( All rights reserved to the creator)[/B][/COLOR]

[COLOR cyan][B]BassFox[/B][/COLOR][COLOR white] - Es un Add-on de [COLOR blue][B]Kodi[/B][/COLOR] con el cual podrás disfrutar de canales de tv y películas gratis, si te están cobrando por este Add-on pide la devolución de tu dinero. Gracias por su preferencia [COLOR cyan][B]BassFox[/B][/COLOR] based on LivetreamsPro by[COLOR cadetblue][B] SHANI ( All rights reserved to the creator)[/B][/COLOR]
extension.disclaimer: Using this add-on is free and at your own risk if the law prohibits the use
El uso de este Add-on es gratuito y bajo tu responsabilidad si las leyes de tu país restringuen su uso

addon.name: [COLOR red]B[/COLOR][COLOR white]ass[/COLOR][COLOR red]F[/COLOR][COLOR white]ox[/COLOR][COLOR red]W[/COLOR][COLOR white]eb[/COLOR]

extension.description: ADDON HERMANO DE BASSFOX ,ESTE SE BASA UNICAMENTE EN PELICULAS ALOJADA EN LAS WEB BASSFOX.ORG [COLOR red]PUEDES DONAR VIA PAYPAL A[/COLOR] [COLOR blue]https://www.paypal.me/bassfox[/COLOR] ESTE PROYECTO ES GRATUITO [COLOR white]Matubass[/COLOR]
AceStream and Sopcast in your favourite media center! Watch peer-to-peer streams in Kodi without the need for external players. Project page: https://github.com/enen92/P2P-Streams-Kodi
AceStream e Sopcast no seu Media-Center de eleição! Assista a streams peer-to-peer no Kodi sem a necessidade de players externos. Página do projecto: https://github.com/enen92/P2P-Streams-Kodi
Acestream en Sopcast in jouw favoriete media center. Kijk peer-to-peer streams in Kodi zonder de noodzaak voor externe spelers. Project pagina: https://github.com/enen92/P2P-Streams-Kodi/
AceStream e SopCast nel tuo Media Center preferito! Guarda i canali peer-to-peer in Kodi senza la necessità di player esterni. Pagina del progetto: https://github.com/enen92/P2P-Streams-Kodi/
extension.disclaimer: The authors does not host nor distribute any of the content you may watch using this addon. The authors have no affiliation with any of the content providers. This addon does not track its users.

Os autores não alojam nem distribuem nenhum do conteúdo acessível a partir deste addon. Os autores não têm qualquer afiliação com nenhum dos sites utilizados por este addon. O addon não contem nenhuma ferramenta de tracking.

De auteurs houden of delen niets van de inhoud die u kunt bekijken met behulp van deze addon. De auteurs hebben geen banden met welke leverancier van inhoud dan ook. Deze addon houdt geen gegevens bij van zijn gebruikers.
L'autore non detiene o distribuisce alcun contenuto fruibile tramite l'utilizzo di questo addon. L'autore non è affiliato con nessun fornitore dei contenuti. Questo addon non traccia i suoi utenti.

extension.news: - Added MPEG-DASH support for Kodi 17 w/ inputstream.mpd Add-on - Added optional Watch Later custom playlist to Settings -> Folders - Added Maintenance section to Settings - Added 'Subtitle language(s) to download' selection to Settings -> General
extension.description: YouTube is one of the biggest video-sharing websites of the world.
YouTube ist eines der größten Video-Sharing-Websites der Welt.
YouTube jest jednym z największych na świecie serwisów udostępniania wideo.
A YouTube világ egyik legnagyobb videómegosztó weboldala.
YouTube es un uno de los mayores sitios web de intercambio de vídeos del mundo.
Данное дополнение позволяет находить и смотреть видео на всеми любимом сайте.
YouTube est l'un des plus grands sites de partage vidéos du monde.
「Youtube」是全世界最大的影片分享網站
YouTube е един от най-големите уеб сайтове за споделяне на видео в целия свят.
Το YouTube είναι μία από τις μεγαλύτερες ιστοσελίδες διαμοιρασμού βίντεο στον κόσμο.
YouTube er en av verdens største nettsider for videodeling.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991

extension.description: Plexus - Any complex structure containing an intricate network of parts. Plexus brings native peer-to-peer support (AceStream and SopCast) for Kodi Entertainment Center for several platforms.[CR][CR]Documentation: (missing)

Plexus - Uma estrutura complexa constituída por uma rede de partes. O Plexus adiciona suporte peer-to-peer nativo (AceStream e Sopcast) ao Kodi Entertainment Center para várias plataformas.[CR][CR]Documentação: (em falta)

Plexus - Una estructura compleja conteniendo una intrincada red de partes. Plexus añade soporte nativo peer-to-peer (AceStream y SopCast) al Centro de Entretenimiento Kodi para varias plataformas.[CR][CR]Documentacion: (falta)
extension.disclaimer: The author does not host nor distribute any of the content you may watch using this addon. The author has no part in the development of any included technologies. When seeking help in Kodi's forum please respect rules (http://kodi.wiki/view/Forum_rules).

Os autores não alojam nem distribuem nenhum do conteúdo que poderá ser reproduzido a partir deste addon. Os autores não têm qualquer parte no desenvolvimento de qualquer uma das tecnologias. Se procurar ajuda no fórum oficial do Kodi por favor respeite as regras do fórum (http://kodi.wiki/view/Forum_rules).

El autor no aloja ni distribuye cualquier contenido que ud. pudiera reproducir usando este addon. El autor no tiene participacion en el desarrollo de cualquier tecnologia incluida. Cuando requiera ayuda en el foro de Kodi por favor respete las reglas (http://kodi.wiki/view/Forum_rules).

extension.description: Installs the Official Addon BassFox and Bassfoxweb (which contains the movies)
Instala el Addon Oficial BassFox y Bassfoxweb (el cual contiene las peliculas)

extension.summary: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi.
extension.description: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi, simplify addon development of video plugins requiring multi video hosts.
